main event: A large UFO passed over San Diego, California, on September 11, 1961, appearing orange-yellow and boiler-shaped.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 3 minutes and occurred at 2:15 AM., The UFO was described as having flashing and rotating lights., The report was communicated via a letter dated February 17, 1962., There was no investigation made by the Air Force at the time of the sighting., The response to the news release questioned the credibility of DOD's conclusions about UFOs.
witness description: The witness described the UFO as larger than six standard bombers and not resembling a disc.
